Package processing.sound

Class AndroidPermissionException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • processing.sound.AndroidPermissionException

  • public class AndroidPermissionException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
    AndroidPermissionException is thrown when trying to create an AudioIn on Android when you have not granted the required RECORD_AUDIO permission.
    See Also:
